body_html: I found a workaround by deleting via script any input: "^add" line from the graph.pbtxt file before running freeze_graph. This way, the global_step branch of the graph is not connected anymore to the inference graph and is correctly removed by convert_variables_to_constants.
body_text: I found a workaround by deleting via script any input: "^add" line from the graph.pbtxt file before running freeze_graph. This way, the global_step branch of the graph is not connected anymore to the inference graph and is correctly removed by convert_variables_to_constants.
body: I found a workaround by deleting via script any `input: "^add"` line from the `graph.pbtxt` file before running `freeze_graph`. This way, the global_step branch of the graph is not connected anymore to the inference graph and is correctly removed by `convert_variables_to_constants`.
